body.name: Little Seeds Monarch Hill Ivy Metal Baby Crib, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 3 hrs 53 mins
features: Modern Metal Crib: Put a smile on your adorable little girl or boy's face with this extremely versatile piece of nursery furniture with a vintage twist. Pair with the matching Ivy Metal Changing Table for a flawless look

Made for Growing Babies: You can count on your infant’s crib to keep pace with 3 different mattress height positions that easily adjust to prevent young children from climbing out. Standard crib size mattress not included

Fun & Carefree Design: The curved corner side panels display top inner arches and the front and back panel show off cascading ball accented spindles for a genuinely playful look while the crib’s all-metal construction ensures durability.

Safe & Reliable: JPMA Certified to meet or exceed all applicable CPSC/ASTM standards and finished in a non-toxic powder coating that is free from phthalates, latex, lead and BPA, offering quality products for your family is our continual goal

Assembled Dimensions: 54.5”L x 29.45”W x 40.63”H. Net weight: 48.5 lbs. All parts, tools, and instructions are included in box. 1-year limited warranty. Recommended for children no taller than 35-inches or weighing no more than 50 lbs.
body.description: Let’s face it – looking at dozens of baby cribs to find the perfect one to complement your little one’s vintage nursery décor can be daunting, but let Little Seeds ease some of your decision anxiety with the Monarch Hill Ivy Black Metal Crib. With its beautifully arched metal frame and decorative ball castings, the Little Seeds Monarch Hill Ivy Black Metal Crib will be to nursery design what the little black dress is to women’s fashion - timelessly classic. Not only will your chic choice blend seamlessly with a modern or vintage style, the metallic white crib mattress support also adjusts to 3 different heights, giving your baby more dream time in their crib until it’s time to graduate to a Little Seeds Toddler Bed (Sold Separately). Little Seeds not only creates this and many more on trend baby and kids’ furniture pieces, we also partner with various environmental protection programs to protect pollinator and other wildlife habitats for future generations.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Little Seeds is a furniture brand providing families with high quality children’s products with great style. Little Seeds is committed to protecting and preserving the environment for our children’s future. And it just starts with a little seed. Just as a plant grows, so does your child’s new Little Seeds furniture. Starting with changing tables that turn into dressers, and cribs that become beds, these juvenile collections are made to grow with your child, from nursery, to toddler, to teen.

Little Seeds Furniture Grace Kelly. Elizabeth Taylor. Audrey Hepburn. They became icons of Old Hollywood glamour with their sophisticated and feminine styles, and the Little Seeds Ambrosia Navy Blue Upholstered Daybed with Trundle captures this same easy elegance in your little starlet’s room without the lavish Hollywood expense. Beautifully upholstered in navy blue faux velvet with diamond tufted detailing in the back and arms, this blue daybed with trundle is perfect for sleepover parties. Have more than one little celebrity sharing the room? The Little Seeds Ambrosia Navy Blue Upholstered Daybed makes the most of small spaces as it accommodates two twin mattresses (sold separately) with the pull-out trundle. Little Seeds Furniture The day is finally here. Your teen son has requested that his once beloved animal print wallpaper should come down and make way for much more grown up and undeniably cool teen room décor. We at Little Seeds understand all too well the challenging emotions parents experience as their little ones grow into their teen years, and though we can’t offer solutions to navigate the emotional storms, we can offer you one of the best loft beds for teens, the Little Seeds Nova Metal Loft Bed with Desk and Shelves. This handsome, industrial style loft bed in gunmetal grey features a sturdy metal frame with a small desk-height surface, three shelves, a ladder, and full-length guard rails surrounding the bed space for safety. Little Seeds Furniture Have everything you need for bedtime in one place with the Little Seeds Monarch Hill Poppy Nightstand. Made of laminated particleboard, the classic white chassis is accented by the pink drawer front for a fun look. Two sets of drawer knobs are included so you can customize the look of the Nightstand. The durable metal drawer slides feature built in stops for safety. Place your child’s lamp and clock on the top surface and organize their favorite bed time stories in the open cubby so you have everything you need to tuck your little one in at night. The drawer is a convenient spot to store smaller items like reading glasses and writing utensils. Little Seeds Furniture It’s what every intrepid explorer dreams of – that amazing feeling of triumph after discovering the perfect find, a kids’ desk for small spaces! Enter the Little Seeds Monarch Hill Haven White Single Pedestal Kids’ Desk. With its classic white finish and beautiful gold drawer pulls, this campaign style single pedestal desk will be the hub of your little adventurer’s creative explorations. This kids’ desk features two drawers for storing treasures and school supplies, but if more storage is needed, simply pair this single pedestal desk with the Little Seeds Monarch Hill Haven White Kids’ Nightstand (sold separately) to transform it into a traditional pedestal desk with two extra drawers. The white kids’ desk also features a wireless charging pad for all Qi enabled devices – just place your device on the pad and watch your battery charge right up! Ambrosia Daybed and Trundle Nova Loft Bed Poppy Nightstand Haven Pedestal Desk

Little Seeds Rugs When considering the best rugs for kids’ rooms, you know that you’re looking for an area rug that is simple yet also chic, something that can perfectly complete your little one’s uber stylish and undeniably cool kids’ room décor. Look no further than the Little Seeds Serenity Blocks Kids’ Room Black & Ivory Area Rug! Create your child's dream destination for playing dress-up, making a fort, or having a dance party. They will love stepping on this kids’ area rug due to its soft, lush pile. Clean ivory lines on top of a black background give this area rug for kids personality and character while the cool and calm hues make it easy to add to any color decor. Little Seeds Rugs When looking for the best rugs for kids’ rooms, we know you want an area rug that is not only trendy and stylish, but also sparks within you a touch of magic and whimsy – as if that kids’ rug could magically transport you to fantastic, far off places you could only dream of! Let the Little Seeds Serenity Archer Kids’ Room Navy Blue Area Rug be just the trendy yet magical spark for your kids’ room décor that you’ve been searching for! Little Seeds Rugs When looking for the best rugs for kids’ rooms, we know you want an area rug that is not only trendy and stylish, but also sparks within you a touch of magic and whimsy – as if that kids’ rug could magically transport you to fantastic, far off places you could only dream of! Let the Little Seeds Serenity Emblem Kids’ Room Blush Rug be just the trendy yet magical spark for your kids’ room décor that you’ve been searching for! Little Seeds Rugs You’re searching through endless area rugs online, trying to find colorful area rugs for kids to complete the look of your little one’s room décor – something playful and casual yet also something that can evolve as your sprout grows into their tween and teen years when they want more creative input in how their room is decorated. Well, the search is over now that you’ve found it – The Little Seeds Serenity Boho Kids’ Room White Area Rug! This on-trend polypropylene kids’ area rug features a colorful diamond pattern that’s as whimsical as it is stylish. Remarkably soft to the touch, its medium-length pile also has a shiny finish. Color, personality, and softness abound, making this machine-made kids’ room rug a must-have for your child’s favorite space. Little Seeds Bodrum Blocks Charcoal/Ivory Little Seeds Serenity Archer Rug Navy Little Seeds Serenity Emblem Rug Blush Little Seeds Serenity Boho Rug White

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We aren’t currently using it yet, but it seems like great quality and already came with the pieces to change it into a toddler bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Table, Slight Annoyances, but Good.
reviews.reviewText: This changing table was bought for a few reasons, I liked the gold to it (it’s more of a bronze in person tho, nbd), the design of the table, and the seemingly simple construction. When it was received, my husband put it together while I sat by and ate some grapefruit. He struggled with one of the bars pretty badly, as it’s piece didn’t fit well and it seemed to be kind of a cheap plastic part, where the bar goes into the rail to hold the shelf. He struggled for about 10 minutes with it, and ultimately had to force it into place resulting in the top shelf being difficult to pop into place. Although in the end, everything was able to be put together fine, and it seems sturdy. I have no qualms other than the annoying sticker (put a hot washcloth over it to steam lift it), slight assembly annoyance, and the misjudge of color... one thing I would like to add is that it came with a little sheet stating that in 2018 they donated something like 1000 garden kits to kids to help the endangered monarch butterfly population, which is very sweet, even though it’s been 3 years, what have they done since then? Not sure, but that was enough to make me feel good about purchasing the table. All in all, I would recommend, but have someone with some muscle put it together because it will need it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars cute but not a true gold
reviews.reviewText: this crib is sturdy and fits the design i was going for! i just wish it was more of a true gold than a bronze. it is very much bronze. it was easy to assemble and came fast!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this crib!It is extremely sturdy and only took 30 minutes to put together. It's pretty light weight and easy to move around once assembled. Definitely glad I purchased this crib.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic gold design
reviews.reviewText: This matches the crib we got. It is well made, sturdy. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was so glad when i found this changing table at the price point that i did. I had purchased the matching crib previously. It came in good condition and i was able to assemble it alone at 34 weeks pregnant. its sturdy and a good height for me. (im 5'3).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and safe
reviews.reviewText: Love this changing table. As others mentioned the stickers are ridiculous a d hard to remove lol but otherwise it's great! It is sturdy and heavy weight so feels safe. I may turn it around backwards once baby starts rolling around so that the higher edge keeps him contained better. As a somewhat taller people this does hurt mine and my spouse's backs to bend over, but it is a standard height so not much you can do there.
